body_html:
expand shares storage. Hence, the effect would be the same across the expanded dimensions, although here it is confusing.

You might want to check repeat, or create an empty tensor and copy_ the expanded tensor into it. I think contiguous creates a contiguous copy of the tensor, which is why it worked.
body_text:
expand shares storage. Hence, the effect would be the same across the expanded dimensions, although here it is confusing.
You might want to check repeat, or create an empty tensor and copy_ the expanded tensor into it. I think contiguous creates a contiguous copy of the tensor, which is why it worked.
body:
`expand` shares storage. Hence, the effect would be the same across the expanded dimensions, although here it is confusing.

You might want to check `repeat`, or create an empty tensor and `copy_` the expanded tensor into it. I think `contiguous` creates a contiguous copy of the tensor, which is why it worked.
